name: In The Snake Pit
description:
Note: Controller highly recommended!!

In The Snake Pit is a top-down arena fighter with roguelike elements. Face off against waves of snake-like foes in a bevvy of different arena layouts to become the new champion of The Pit!

After each wave choose how you would like to upgrade your character to face the increasing enemy forces - will you increase attack damage, health, or speed?

Master the movement of your character by utilising both your sword and bow for close-up and long-range attacks, and dashing out of the way of enemy assaults and traps.

Use the layout of the arena to your advantage, knocking enemies into spike traps and the central pit. Use nearby health crystals to recover from damage and teleport around the arena by passing through the gates.

The forces of The Pit are ready to fight - will you rise to the challenge?

A Falmouth University Year 1 team project.
